website_summaries.verdict: The Ion iPTUSB is as useful as it is adorable, with sound quality that defies its small size.
pros: The Ion iPTUSB turntable is light, portable, and includes a USB output for recording directly to your computer
cons: The recording software included with the Ion iPTUSB could be better, and the plastic tone arm feels flimsy

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a week ago, and it in that time the price has gone up from around 82 to 93. I bought mine from Warehouse deals for 77. I figured I'd take a gamble, and everything was perfect. I bought this based on a CNET recommendation. You can view a short video on their site and they show you all of the bells and whistles. I basically wanted something for listening, but the fact that it has so many other options on it was a plus. The sound is really great. Even the small speaker on the player is pretty good for being what it is. I've plugged it into a receiver and sounds better that way.
customer_reviews.author: J Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great little guy for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Don't be put off by the price of this little guy (cheap doesn't always mean bad). Perfect small turntable comes with two software programs for CD conversion of desired. Reasonable built in speaker (ok so it's not surround sound stereo!) allows for playback at record shows, while you're on vacation etc... Battery option allows sound-hounds to check quality at garage sales before buying... Alltogether a nice turntable for the price. I upgraded from the ITTUSB, and am very happy with my decision. Built in carry case makes this perfect in my book! Ok so not the kind of thing you'd buy to create your 'home theatre' system, but ideal for the hobbyist/small time vinyl explorer
customer_reviews.author: 45Vinyl

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny with the right software!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to transfer my music-loving mom's vinyl collection for her Christmas. I was not too impressed with the included software. It works but not as reliable as I wanted. After reviewing software from a lot of smaller vendors I settled on Sony Sound Forge Audio Studio. It does everything I wanted with reliable high-quality results. The turntable works very well and I am overall pleased. The replacement styluses are available on Amazon at a reasonable price. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking to digitize vinyl records.
customer_reviews.author: Alan D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Really quiet speaker - not really compatible with macs
customer_reviews.text: I got this hoping to transfer some of my LPs to my macbook. The software isn't easily usable with a mac, I ended up having to use my desktop PC to transfer LPs to MP3s, and the quality was average. I also hoped to use this as a record player, but the speakers were very quiet, I ended up plugging other speakers into it to improve sound. I really appreciated its size, very compact and easily moveable, but definitely not the best product out there for someone looking to transfer high quality music.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca

customer_reviews.title: Good for ripping records, not much else.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this record player to rip records into mp3 format. It works well for this purpose. Came with Audacity software which is also free to download. Audacity works well for basic ripping and trimming of the records, haven't used it for more complex work. If you are purchasing this record player to listen to your records directly, you may be disappointed. Sounds decent with a pair of headphones, but the built in speaker is very weak and poor sounding. Has controls to slightly speed up or slow down a record, which works well.
customer_reviews.author: Remo

customer_reviews.title: Good record player
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 15 year old nephew last christmas and it is still in good working order. The built in speaker isn't great so my nephew hooks it up to his amp and it sounds like a high quality stereo. He uses it daily and hasn't had any problems with it. My only complaint is that it doesn't have a lid like the old fashioned record players which leaves it unprotected.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Works as Documented
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad as a birthday gift so he could catch up with his collection of LP records from back in the day. Ended up borrowing it more than a few times to convert several tracks for myself from his collection. It SIMPLY WORKS! For the price, it is an excellent bargain. If you don't need anything more than play and convert (90% of users), don't go for anything more expensive. This works! PS: Works excellently on my Mac. Straight forward to use. As we say in Nigeria: "no long thing"!
customer_reviews.author: Olabode

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the price of a traditional turntable. Portability is a bonus. Sound quality as good as a small speaker gets but not stereo. Can be hooked up to stereo system but I like it just the way it is. Comes with a power plug and a long USB wire connector. Turntable starts to turn when you put a record on it. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this product to anyone with old LPs who wants to hear original sound quality in a light compact portable unit.
customer_reviews.author: CEG

customer_reviews.title: Fun product
customer_reviews.text: The Ion Portable Turntable system is very easy to use and does a good job. There is nothing that a casual user would miss. The hardware and software are simple to use and do the job. I have a hunch a true audiophile would find it pretty basic but it isn't sold or priced as a high end audio device. A perfectly acceptable piece of equipment that brings a lot of old favorites back to the party. Be warned, your friends probably have their own secret stashes of old vinyl. Get used to friends showing up with take-out and a bottle of wine in one hand and a stack of albums in the other.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Baxter

customer_reviews.title: and we absolutely love it! I researched for hours before buying it
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have had this record player for several years now, and we absolutely love it! I researched for hours before buying it, and was very happy with the purchase (and so was he). We always recommend it to friends who are looking into buying a record player.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Ion Audio Portable Turntable
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say that I love the Ion Audio Portable Turntable. I LIKE it. I would LOVE it if you could turn the sound up more. You turn it up as far as it will go and then strain to hear it unless you are sitting right next to it.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for. Sound quality is better than I thought.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product for the first turntable I bought. Compared to others I've heard, the sound quality is much better. It's light and easy to carry and I move it from my bedroom to the living room a lot. It's definitely been the center of the party and everyone loves it. I like that it can be plugged into other speakers too when needed-haven't needed it yet.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: I'm transferring all of my LP's to MP3 and this is how I'm doing it.
customer_reviews.text: There were some learning curves. Mostly the software that came with it isn't what works with it. It was easy enough to find the correct software to download. Have a long way to go but, have transferred over 100 albums to mp3 and loaded them on my iPod.
customer_reviews.author: pepdot

customer_reviews.title: Making old music like new again
customer_reviews.text: The ION Audio iPTUSB turntable is great! We have so many old LP's and 45's just stuck away. Some of them can be found on CD at various sources but we wanted our's preserved. So far this player seems to work really well and the software that comes with is simple to install and use.
customer_reviews.author: michelann

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and time!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this hoping to put LP collection on iPod. It does the job, but the sound quality is horrible. Recording is very low. He spent a lot of time with this only to resort to iTunes for better sounding downloads.
customer_reviews.author: Aly s

customer_reviews.title: Worked great to turn my dads records to digital on our ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great to turn my dads records to digital on our computer and then to cds for his truck. Fun too as now we have a working record player in the house...
customer_reviews.author: Heather Bienz

customer_reviews.title: Very good unit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, does a very good job of what it is intended for. My only complaint is that the gain knob is in a very awkward place and makes it easy to bump the unit and cause a skip while trying to adjust. That is a minor complaint for the price of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working Completely after about 6 Months
customer_reviews.text: Decent construction for the price, fair LP to MP3 conversion, cheap needle, was satisfied at first. Then it stopped working, a don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and dose the job but if your looking to ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and dose the job but if your looking to put your vinyl on your computeon this is not the one
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: My son is not of the general who grew up with turntables; he really enjoyed the novelty of this item. He started collecting vintage Led Zepplin albums. This was his first opportunity to listen to these albums. The digital aspect of it allowed him to connect to his XBox or laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Ion is great!
customer_reviews.text: I just got my ion turntable. It is really easy to use, and sounds great. The built-in speaker exceeded my expectations. The dustcover latches and there is a handle, so it is easy to move and take places. There is NO background buzz at all. It was a great buy, I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: J.w.

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this turntable. Easy to use and sounds great through my iHome using the headphone jack. The design is rad, looks like a briefcase from Star Wars. As I am writing this, I am converting some old Carpenters albums onto my MacBook. The only thing holding me back from giving it 5 stars is the unavailability to use the EZ Track feature. First world problems right? I'm fine with editing each LP side into individual tracks. Great product. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: James McGaha

customer_reviews.title: great Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: My daughter, who wants to "go retro," asked for this for Christmas last year. She loved it! I'm so glad you had this on line, as it was hard to find in person for the price. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: E. Elizabeth Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great little turntable
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this particular turntable from the reviews for the price and the battery option as we live in Europe . We own so many LP's and wanted to test them out after many years of no use. It has been worth every penny and we haven't even tried the software yet! We are very happy with the sound quality for such a cute little machine. It brought back a lot of memories of flipping the LP's and appreciate the convenience of modern technology but are happy to listen to some "blasts from the past."
customer_reviews.author: guitarlover

customer_reviews.title: Portable turntable
customer_reviews.text: Great just what I wanted. To turn my record music into digital for downloading. Would recommend this product. Of course it is time consuming but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B. Lisk

customer_reviews.title: Well thought out, Well Made product
customer_reviews.text: Ion Portable USB turntable/vinyl archiver is everything the Crosley record players should be. This turntable is well made, and does what it is supposed to do. Completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip B. Tursky

customer_reviews.title: I cannot imagine worse sound without it being Fischer Price
customer_reviews.text: Skip it. The portability might be nice, but the needle/stylus on this record player is terrible. Tinny sound, with absolutely no low end. I can't find a stylus that is an upgrade (by all means, someone point me in the right direction). Using this to digitize your LPs is doing their sound a tremendous disservice. If you're going to go through the time and effort to do so, find something with a better (not made of plastic) needle.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Clark

customer_reviews.title: nice and portable
customer_reviews.text: Everyone at my house loves this. The speaker is low quality, but we can hook it up to better speakers. Very portable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my self it is so awesome it doesn't get any better than this and for the price no body had to twist my arm to buy it
customer_reviews.author: Elentz

customer_reviews.title: Ion Portable USB turntable is the way to go if you're a DJ!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best portable turntable under $100 on the market. I have tried different models but this gets the job done right. Easy to use right out of the box. The recording software is basic but will turn your vinyl to MP3 quickly. I have been a dj for over 25 years and need to get music into my Serato quickly for gigs. This is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: uniessence

customer_reviews.title: Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Received the turntable with in a few days ordering it. Very happy with quality of the product. Cant way to play music!
customer_reviews.author: Chad G Dellinger

customer_reviews.title: ION USB Turntable
customer_reviews.text: For the price this does a very good job. You can't manipulate the quality of the sound but if you just want to copy old records this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn S. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: ION Audio USB Turntable
customer_reviews.text: I researched the ION USB Turntable and read the comments on Amazon from the other customers who bought one,and then I made the decision to buy it through Amazon. They all claimed it was an easy set up and they were right.. I have made over 25 vinyl transfers, and with the right wiring, and cassette player you can also transfer them to CD's also.....Excellent ! ! ! ! I am very happy with my purchase from AMAZON...
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Affordable with good sound
customer_reviews.text: I did my research and found that this was the best USB turntable for your money if you are looking to stay under $500 which I was. I really like it although without speakers it is not that loud.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Kenworthy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: One of my major disappointments is the vinyl to mp3 method. The mp3s barely come out audible. I'll admit though, I'm not sure if this is true of most systems or just this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cam H

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this item, recommending it to other family members. Good quality for his needs and albums he has purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn A. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: ION Audio iPTUSB Portable USB Turntable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit. Good sound plus very portable and very compact to stow on a shelf. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Elora

customer_reviews.title: Everything I could ask for in a record player.
customer_reviews.text: Great price, easy setup. This record player is both portable and sounds great. The built in speaker is just loud enough for a normal sized room, everything about it has run great so far and I am very satisfied with my purchase. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Hale

customer_reviews.title: A great choice for archiving your LPs.
customer_reviews.text: I took this out of the box and it was ready to go immediately. I didn't try to connect it to my computer, but as a stand alone unit, it is a very good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Laurent J. LaBrie

customer_reviews.title: Turntable to record albums to I-tumes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this turntable to transfer my old LPs to my I-tunes, so the speakers didn't really matter to me. The first few albums I didn't adjust the volume on the recording so it wasn't very loud. There is an adjustment for to volume in the software, that I didn't adjust till later. It all works fine now.
customer_reviews.author: paparock

customer_reviews.title: USB turntable
customer_reviews.text: The unit worked well, and did what it was suppose to do (play LPs), but the audio quality was very poor. I returned the turntable because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Louie Night

customer_reviews.title: Five star piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this piece of technology. Easy to do, and I have a lot of LP's that I wanted to change over to mp3s and CD's..
customer_reviews.author: Ben B. Crim

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY and SIMPLICITY
customer_reviews.text: Whenever one buys a product that performs as stated in the ad or better, one looks up to see if there is a star shining in the East. This ION turntable made me look upward.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Rousos

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: It is compact, durable, and yet gives great sound quality. I am very satisfied with this purchase and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: potatospam

customer_reviews.title: It looks as cheap as it is
customer_reviews.text: I'm a newb... Wanted something compact all in one to start off with. Like the feature of being able to transfer to MP3. Thats probably all this is good for, I didn't even try. I put on one album and knew I was done with this, returned it right away. The sound from my cellphone speaker sounds way better and is way louder than the speaker on this thing. So if all you want to do is rip mp3s maybe this might work, but if you want it to enjoy listening to records, don't even bother. Its cheap plastic, thats all.
customer_reviews.author: CPatterson

customer_reviews.title: Just getting started with vinyl
customer_reviews.text: As a person who is just getting started with vinyl, I need a relatively cheap, but easy to use high quality record player. This one did the job perfectly. Awesome buy I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Using Smile

customer_reviews.title: ION USB Turntable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this turntable for the specific purpose of transferring my vinyl recordings to CD - and I am not disappointed. This item is easy to set up and easy to use. I would not recommend it for stand-alone listening, but for this purpose it fills the bill. The instructions are brief and easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: carolla

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: I expecting a larger base with a cover that could cover the LP when playing. Short of that it is well worth the cost and the output is as good as the larger units.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: produces poor fidelity
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this unit to convert vinyl to CDs. That it does, but at noticeable loss of fidelity. Bass is nearly non-existent in the resulting digitized music. I turn bass all the way up in my equalizer and the treble down low, and still get tinny, hollow sound with no bass.
customer_reviews.author: bearman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing at First Now a 4 STAR
customer_reviews.text: The Ez Vinyl software lacks clear instructions, especially computer settings. I have tried it now for the last several hours and everything I import is very bad. I have an email in to tech support...no phone support. (bad) Hopefully it will be my operator error, if so I will write another review. If tech support cant handle the problem I will return UPDATE..4STARS had connected USB thru router which was causing problems, also changed sound pref inputs to USB Codec. Works Great now....
customer_reviews.author: G. Tate

customer_reviews.title: I have no patience for that mysterious techno-voodoo crap. Stuff should just work in a predictable
customer_reviews.text: it broke about 1 year in, then my son unplugged it, plugged it back in and it worked. I have no patience for that mysterious techno-voodoo crap. Stuff should just work in a predictable, non-prayer based way.
customer_reviews.author: mister_kevin

customer_reviews.title: useless piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: useless.................nothing worked as advertised...........hate having to use iTunes in the first place. Just using it as a standalone player doesn't work, with the volume up 100% you can barely hear it from the speaker ...............
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: did not receive right item
customer_reviews.text: They substituted for another turntable. It was a gift for my husband. He hated it! Tried to return but too much trouble. Also costs too much to send back. Won't make that mistake again.
customer_reviews.author: Janis A. Scott

product_meta.title: Ion Audio iPTUSB Portable USB Turntable with Software and Built-in Speaker
product_meta.description:
The ION iPTUSB is a revolutionary battery operated portable USB turntable that allows you to convert your old vinyl collection to CD or MP3 with included recording software. (NO SPECIAL DRIVERS NEEDED). This turntable also has a line level output for connecting to any home stereo with an AUX input and a built-in speaker for stand-alone operation. ION iPTUSB Includes Protective Cover Power Adapter USB Cable Recording Software CD Quick Start Guide ION iPTUSB Features USB output Protective dustcover and integrated carrying handle Fits inside a standard 12 inch record case Battery powered by 6 D cells (not included) or AC wall adapter (included) Built-in speaker Belt-drive motor with 33, 45 and 78 RPM settings +/-10% pitch control Plays all standard sized records up to 12 inches Line level and headphone output 45 adapter included Cartridge included USB cable included AmericanMusical is an authorized dealer of Ion Audio products.

AMAZON.COM
ake your vinyl collection on the go with the Ion Audio iPTUSB portable turntable, which runs on both AC power (with included adapter) or six D-sized batteries. Additionally, with its USB connectivity, you'll be able to jack it into your Windows- or Mac-based PC to easily turn your LPs and 45s into digital files. 

 



The Ion Audio iPTUSB portable, USB-connected turntable (see larger image
as well as a schematic of control panel features).  

The included cover with handle (see larger image). 

The iPTUSB also has a line input jack so you can connect other music sources such as cassette decks, and turn your other music into MP3s. It also includes controls for adjusting the gain (if audio from the turntable is too quite or too loud), audio level of the line out, tone control, and pitch control (up to ±10 percent). Once on your computer, you can listen, make custom playlists, record it to CD, and transfer it to your iPod or MP3 player. It has a built-in speaker for listening to your records and monitoring your recordings.  It comes with everything you need to turn your music into digital MP3 files. ION's exclusive software suite makes transfer and editing your music easy. EZ Vinyl Converter provides an easy way to transfer your music and import it into your iTunes music library. And it also includes a dust cover with handle, cartridge with stylus, 45RPM adapter, cables, and slipmat. 

KEY FEATURES
 * Turn your records into MP3s and listen anywhere 
 * Plug and play USB: no drivers needed 
 * Protective dust cover with integrated carrying handle 
 * Plays all standard sized records up to 12 inches 
 * Fits in a standard 12-inch record case 
 * Battery powered by six D-sized batteries or AC power adapter 
 * Built-in speaker 
 * 33 and 45 RPM speeds 
 * ±10 percent pitch control 
 * Headphone output--both 1/8- and 1/4-inch jacks 
 * Line output for home listening 
 * 1/8-inch-stereo line input digitize music from cassettes or other sources 
 * Works with Mac and PC 

 What's in the Box
iPTUSB turntable, dust cover, slipmat, 45 rpm adapter, cartridge with pre-assembled stylus, USB cable, audio cables, power adapter, software CD, quick start guide 

 Computer Requirements


 * PC: Windows XP (32-bit or 64-bit) or Vista (32-bit or 64-bit) 
 * Mac: OS X 10.4 or later 

 



With EZ Vinyl Converter, you can quickly start recording LP tracks... 

...and then tag individual tracks with artist, album, and song title tags.
feature_bullets: Protective dust cover with integrated carrying handle
Fits in a standard 12" record case
Battery-powered by 6 D batteries or AC power adapter

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars128 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
